instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2530: What is 820-2530? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2530</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> white screen
threads.message: So i have a macbook which only boots up to a white screen, tried smc, nvram, pram reset and swapped ram all i get is a white screen cannot boot to recovery mode no apple logo. What could be the issue where should i start? Bad smc?

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2530</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> white screen
threads.message: No 3V to LCD. Check L9004 and voltage there.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2530</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> white screen
threads.message:
No voltage on l9004

upon further inspection noticed a tiny bit of corrosion on the board. Ran it through ultrasonics and mac is working again.
